resources.string: Via the SETTINGS menu, set a valid API key for the api.themoviedb.org website in order to display the top movies here. The SETTINGS menu is accessed via the three dots in the upper right of the screen. In SETTINGS you can also choose to view movies sorted by their popularity or ratings.
